text:
I am not redeeming things now

A dimly lit room, tension in the air.  
‘I've only a silver rouble left!’  

‘Delirium! You kept mentioning rings!’  

‘How did that idea spread among them?’  

---

A bustling street, hope mixed with uncertainty.  
‘Shall we find him?’  

‘Yes! He’s a nice fellow, trust me.’  

‘What makes him so anxious to meet?’

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin discusses a man who is eager to meet Rodya, highlighting his intelligence and past success in solving a murder case.
